verses.name: Luke 18:26
verses.text: And they that heard it said, Who then can be saved?

verses.name: Luke 18:27
verses.text: And he said, The things which are impossible with men are possible with God.

verses.name: Luke 18:28
verses.text: Then Peter said, Lo, we have left all, and followed thee.

verses.name: Luke 18:29
verses.text: And he said unto them, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or parents, or brethren, or wife, or children, for the kingdom of God’s sake,

verses.name: Luke 18:30
verses.text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time, and in the world to come life everlasting.
